text:
protip: append "&list=UL&shuffle-913" to the end of any of @SupraDarky 's videos to make a randomized playlist of every single song he has uploaded!

thanks a bunch for years of music, Supradarky, You don't know the number of games i have played solely because of the music i have heard from your lists. thank you.

text: My ears... they burn.  Well, just ONE bad song out of 1,700 videos is a good record still, SupraDarky!

text: I read the manga from start to finish in about a week and a half.  I was so hooked after the first page.  It's easily my favorite series now that Berserk has devolved into what it is now.  :(

text: I absolutely loved Monster. It dethroned Death Note as my favorite anime. You should check out Dennou Coil--nice and short, unique, and wonderful.

text:
Wow, that's kind of a weird coincidence. I just finished this series for the first time a couple weeks ago.
It's definitely great, although a little too contrived at times. Johan makes up for all of that though by being a badass.

author: Hassaan Lightstone

text: This is the credits song that plays starting at around episode 35 I think. I wasn't a fan of Hemming's voice at first, but it quickly grew on me and I find it perfectly fits the story's mood. This is absolutely recommended, I can guarantee it will leave you with a lasting﻿ impression. It gave me﻿ that empty feeling once I got done with it, as is often the case with a TV show you really enjoyed.
author: SupraDarky

text: The weariness in her ancient voice really fits the show
author: Guyal Sfere

text: I usually watch about one or two anime series a year and upload﻿ a track from the ones I really liked (Elfen﻿ Lied in 2010, Death Note in 2011 and Welcome to the NHK in 2012). Monster is quite the slow burner with its 74 episodes, but while﻿ some people find it has a couple filler episodes, I found it helped develop a lot of the secondary characters in an important way. The whole anime feels both beautiful and terrifying at times and you really pull for Tenma to end up living happily.
author: SupraDarky
